SH.PROVIDERS"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.JDBCComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"enableTrim":"N","easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"isAutoRepartition":"Y","databaseName":"","failComponentWhenDatasetEmpty":"N","maskDataColumns":"[]","componentId":10,"componentName":"emergency_patients tgr","tableName":"emergency_patients_tgr","category":"Source","componentType":"JDBC","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"Cloud_Oracle","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[],"options":{"dbTable":"select RESULT_ID,PATIENT_ID,VISIT_ID,TEST_CODE,TEST_NAME,RESULT_VALUE_NUM,LOWER_LIMIT,UPPER_LIMIT,IS_CRITICAL,RESULT_DATE,PATIENT_NAME,PROVIDER_NAME,VISIT_TYPE,CREATED_AT from SH.PATIENT_EMERGENCY_CASES where TEST_CODE='$[TEST_CODE]'"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.JDBCComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":7,"componentName":"emergency_patients src","tableName":"emergency_patients_src","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[6,2,3,5],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT
    lr.result_id,
    lr.patient_id,
    lr.visit_id,
    lr.test_code,
    lr.test_name,

    CAST(regexp_replace(lr.result_value, '[^0-9\\.]', '') AS DOUBLE) AS result_value_num,

    CAST(
        regexp_extract(
            regexp_replace(lr.reference_range, '\\s', ''),
            '([0-9]+)[-–]([0-9]+)',
            1
        ) AS DOUBLE
    ) AS lower_limit,

    CAST(
        regexp_extract(
            regexp_replace(lr.reference_range, '\\s', ''),
            '([0-9]+)[-–]([0-9]+)',
            2
        ) AS DOUBLE
    ) AS upper_limit,

    CASE
        WHEN CAST(regexp_replace(lr.result_value, '[^0-9\\.]', '') AS DOUBLE) <
             CAST(regexp_extract(regexp_replace(lr.reference_range, '\\s', ''), '([0-9]+)[-–]([0-9]+)', 1) AS DOUBLE)
        THEN 'CRITICAL'

        WHEN CAST(regexp_replace(lr.result_value, '[^0-9\\.]', '') AS DOUBLE) >
             CAST(regexp_extract(regexp_replace(lr.reference_range, '\\s', ''), '([0-9]+)[-–]([0-9]+)', 2) AS DOUBLE)
        THEN 'CRITICAL'

        ELSE 'NORMAL'
    END AS is_critical,

    lr.result_date,

    CONCAT(p.first_name, ' ', p.last_name) AS patient_name,
    pr.provider_name,
    v.visit_type

FROM lab_results lr
LEFT JOIN patients p     ON lr.patient_id = p.patient_id
LEFT JOIN visits v       ON lr.visit_id = v.visit_id
LEFT JOIN providers pr   ON v.provider_id = pr.provider_id
where v.visit_type='Emergency'
and p.phone_number is not null
and pr.provider_name is not null
and lr.test_code= "$[TEST_CODE]"
"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"sourceDataFrame":"emergency_patients_src","targetDataFrame":"emergency_patients_tgr","mapping":[{"sourceColumn":"result_id","sourceType":"decimal(38,10)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(38,10)","targetColumn":"RESULT_ID","targetType":"decimal(38,10)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(38,10)","unique":"Y","columnOrder":0},{"sourceColumn":"patient_id","sourceType":"decimal(38,10)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(38,10)","targetColumn":"PATIENT_ID","targetType":"decimal(38,10)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(38,10)","unique":"N","columnOrder":1},{"sourceColumn":"visit_id","sourceType":"decimal(38,10)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(38,10)","targetColumn":"VISIT_ID","targetType":"decimal(38,10)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(38,10)","unique":"N","columnOrder":2},{"sourceColumn":"test_code","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"TEST_CODE","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":3},{"sourceColumn":"test_name","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"TEST_NAME","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":4},{"sourceColumn":"result_value_num","sourceType":"double","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"double","targetColumn":"RESULT_VALUE_NUM","targetType":"decimal(38,10)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(38,10)","unique":"N","columnOrder":5},{"sourceColumn":"lower_limit","sourceType":"double","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"double","targetColumn":"LOWER_LIMIT","targetType":"decimal(38,10)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(38,10)","unique":"N","columnOrder":6},{"sourceColumn":"upper_limit","sourceType":"double","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"double","targetColumn":"UPPER_LIMIT","targetType":"decimal(38,10)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(38,10)","unique":"N","columnOrder":7},{"sourceColumn":"is_critical","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"IS_CRITICAL","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":8},{"sourceColumn":"result_date","sourceType":"DateType","sourceDataFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd","sourceTypeChange":"Y","originalSourceType":"timestamp","targetColumn":"RESULT_DATE","targetType":"DateType","targetDataFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd","targetTypeChange":"Y","orginalTargetType":"timestamp","unique":"N","columnOrder":9},{"sourceColumn":"patient_name","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"PATIENT_NAME","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":10},{"sourceColumn":"provider_name","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"PROVIDER_NAME","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":11},{"sourceColumn":"visit_type","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"VISIT_TYPE","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat"
